name: Gaurav Singhal
description: Gaurav was previously the first Lead Data Scientist at the United Nations World Food Programme, and holds MSc degrees in Economics and Information Science from the University of Michigan.

name: Dr. Laurence E. Day
description: Laurence was previously a risk analytics software engineer at Standard Chartered Bank specialising in functional programming, and holds a PhD in Computer Science from the University of Nottingham.

name: Nupur Joshi
description: Nupur was previously a McKinsey & Company multi-stakeholder strategy and operational transformation consultant, and holds an MBA from Wharton.

name: Gaurav Paruthi
description: Gaurav was previously a R&D engineer at KindredAI, and holds a PhD in Human Computer Interaction from University of Michigan.
